1.text:
●Scene: Sol and Isuku's service H scene, with
Isuku as the main.

7.name: Narration
7.text:
Inside the dimly lit cheap inn, Sol's tail

8.text:

9.name: Narration

27.text:

29.name: Sol
29.text: "Nngh... chuup... n... nfuu... n, n, nn, nnn..."

45.text:

53.name: Narration
53.text:
